releases.summary: Initial release with core identity management features.

features.title: Multi-user identity management
features.description: Add, list, use, and delete Git identities

features.title: SSH key management
features.description: Generate or import SSH keys for each identity

features.title: Clone with identity
features.description: Clone repositories with the correct SSH configuration

features.title: Remote management
features.description: Fix and restore remote URLs for bgit compatibility

features.title: Safe uninstall
features.description: Safely uninstall bgit and restore all repositories

features.title: Cross-platform support
features.description: Works on Linux, macOS, and Windows
